attributes.action: Petition for "The Simpsons: Hit & Run" to be Remastered for the newest consoles.
attributes.additional_details: As seen recently with the releases of games such as "Crash Bandicoot N' Sane Trilogy", remastered games are extremely popular and attract an extremely large audience, making this viable for both the developer and the consumer.
attributes.background: The Simpsons: Hit & Run was a phenomenal game loved by almost all that played it as a child. It is a shame that the newer generations will never experience the fun and thrills of this masterpiece as it is not readily available for the latest consoles.
